properties.query:
//Author: Rob Russell
//Description: Office 365 E5 licenses come with enhanced telemetry that allows for advanced threat detection. This analytic looks for licenses being downgraded from E5 as it could be a sign of an attacker attempting to avoid detection.
// This analytic extracts SKU data from the additional data field of audit logs and looks for the removal of E5 licenses or licenses with enhanced security features.
//References
//https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/enterprise/compare-office-365-plans?
//https://www.inversecos.com/2021/09/office365-attacks-bypassing-mfa.html
//https://www.csoonline.com/article/3628330/the-most-dangerous-and-interesting-microsoft-365-attacks.html
//working with audit log license data
//http://practical365.com/why-microsoft-365-audit-logs-lack-proper-fit-and-finish/
// test log on TI with srowley@dod365ti.onmicrosoft.us at around 3:06pm on 4 April 2022
// False Positives: Changes to licenses names or unknown licenses that support E5 or G5 features could trigger this alert. 
let whiteListUsers = dynamic(["initiatedByUser@toIgnore.com"]); // add users here you do NOT want to monitor
let protectedE5SKU = dynamic(["EMSPREMIUM_USGOV_DOD", 
"ENTERPRISEPREMIUM_NOPSTNCONF_USGOV_DOD", 
"Microsoft_365_G5_FOR_DOD_USGOV_DOD",
"IDENTITY_THREAT_PROTECTION_AR_USGOV_DOD"]); //list of SKUs that employ E5 security enhancements
AuditLogs
| where Result == "success"
| where TargetResources has "SkuName"
| extend initiatedByUser = parse_json(InitiatedBy).user.userPrincipalName
| extend TargetResourcesJSON = parse_json(TargetResources[0])
| extend TargetName = TargetResourcesJSON.displayName
| extend licenseDataType = TargetResourcesJSON.type
| extend licenseDataUPN = TargetResourcesJSON.userPrincipalName
| mv-expand TargetResourcesJSON.modifiedProperties
| extend modPropDisplayName = tostring(TargetResourcesJSON_modifiedProperties.displayName)
| extend modPropDisplayNewValue = tostring(TargetResourcesJSON_modifiedProperties.newValue)
| extend modPropDisplayOldValue = tostring(TargetResourcesJSON_modifiedProperties.oldValue)
| where modPropDisplayName in ("AssignedLicense", "GroupLicenseAssignment")
| extend oldSKUs = extract_all(@'(?:SkuName=)(?P<value>\w+)', modPropDisplayOldValue)
| extend newSKUs = extract_all(@'(?:SkuName=)(?P<value>\w+)', modPropDisplayNewValue)
| where isnotempty(newSKUs) and isnotempty(oldSKUs)
| where (oldSKUs has_any (protectedE5SKU)) and not(newSKUs has_any (protectedE5SKU))| project
    TimestampCustomEntity = TimeGenerated,
    initiatedByUser,
    TargetName,
    OperationName,
    Result,
    licenseDataUPN,
    licenseDataType,
    oldSKUs,
    newSKUs
properties.description:
Office 365 E5 licenses com with enhanced telemetry that allows for advanced threat detection. This analytic looks for licenses being downgraded from E5 as it could be a sign of an attacker attempting to avoid detection.
PLATFORM:Windows
MITRE:TA0005;T1562
